amendment.description: Amendment sought to require a 10% reduction in the Thrifty Food Plan calculation in any year that the Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program is not authorized.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 23 printed in Part B of House Report 113-117 to require a 10% reduction in the Thrifty Food Plan calculation in any year that the Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program is not authorized.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Conaway amendment (A022) Failed by voice vote.
